turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what can i do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to place an order for Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! What can I get started for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to pick up an espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, an Espresso, is that a single shot of espresso?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I'd like a triple shot of espresso but added to a beverage.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, is that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay an iced Caramel Macchiato with a tripple shot of espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright and where would you like to pick this up at?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright, give me a moment to find this location.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Have you found the Starbucks on US 127 in Frankfort, Kentucky 40601?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A nearby store would also be okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, i think i found one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is it on 1303 US 127 South, Frankfort, KY 40601?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! thank so much for your patience.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: give me a moment to send over your order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, your iced Caramel Macchiato with a tripple shot of espresso is in the works. It will be ready for pick up in 8 mins.
